participant_actions.sent: Industrial and user interface design: propositions for the remote control Market study and propositions for a sellable remote control Prepare next meeting for the project manager

participant_decisions.sent: Participants discussed about their role in the remote control creation process.
Decide at the end of the meeting to draw some animal on the white board.

participant_problems.sent: Participants were not really feeling well in their role.
Problem between the interface user designer and the industrial designer: which role for each of them.
But problem solved after discussion with the two other members.
Emphasize the problem of the price of the remote control: not too expensive and "international"
